name: New Staff I
objective: Meet with Grand Mage Archilus to complete daily training

first_task_locations.name: Ashen
first_task_locations.description: A town in the snowy hills, home to the well-renowned Magic Academy. This town is a hub for mystical arts, where the novice and best sorcerers, alchemists, and more come to learn and exchange knowledge.

goal: Grand Mage Archilus is willing to train the mage and help them become Mage Supreme.

name: New Staff II
objective: Acquire a special magical stone to use for your new staff

first_task_locations.name: Wycan Forest
first_task_locations.description: This forest is always dark, surrounded by a deep cloud of mist. Some of the people who’ve entered this forest never returned or went insane. Those with strong acumen can withstand whatever magic this forest entails.

quest_giver.name: Grand Mage Archilus
quest_giver.description: One of the superintendent of the well-renowned Magic Academy, a highly-esteemed academy for magic arts. He has been studying magic for several decades, an excellent master of his craft.

items.name: Ovin's Stone
items.description: a magical stone imbued with the power of Ovin, one of the past celestials who, in folklore, was deemed responsible for the curse of the Wycan Forest.

enemies.name: Evil Imp
enemies.description: A demonic imp that roams Wycan Forest. It yearns to consume the unfortunate souls that explore this forest.

goal: After Grand Mage Archilus trained the mage, he notices that they need a better weapon. He can craft a new and better staff for the mage, so they can become Mage Supreme. Archilus advises the mage to search for a magical stone.

name: New Staff III
objective: Acquire a special bark to use for your new staff

first_task_locations.name: Sierran Woodlands
first_task_locations.description: A dense forest, covered in snow and trees of all kinds and shapes. Some say these trees hold magical energy that can be used to heal, curse, and much more.

quest_giver.name: Grand Mage Archilus
quest_giver.description: One of the superintendent of the well-renowned Magic Academy, a highly-esteemed academy for magic arts. He has been studying magic for several decades, an excellent master of his craft.

items.name: Bark of Agbara
items.description: The grand tree of Agbara was placed here by the hero Arun, legends say the celestial Simi bestowed the tree to Arun as her dying wish. Many who travel through here get a piece of the bark for good fortune.

goal: After Grand Mage Archilus trained the mage, he notices that they need a better weapon. He can craft a new and better staff for the mage, so they can become Mage Supreme. Archilus advises the mage to search for a special bark.

name: New Staff IV
objective: Return back to Grand Mage Archilus with Ovin's Stone and bark of Agbara to craft your new staff

quest_giver.name: Grand Mage Archilus
quest_giver.description: One of the superintendent of the well-renowned Magic Academy, a highly-esteemed academy for magic arts. He has been studying magic for several decades, an excellent master of his craft.

reward.name: Enchanted Staff
reward.description: A long staff with Ovin’s stone beaming at the top. One can feel an immense power radiating from the staff.

goal: After the mage retrieved Ovin's Stone and Bark of Agbara, Grand Mage Archilus crafts the Enchanted Staff for the mage. He commends the mage for their diligence.

name: Supreme I
objective: talk to Grand Mage Archilus to learn about how to get stronger

first_task_locations.name: Elria
first_task_locations.description: A beautiful, prosperous, and grand city, home to many of the mystic and physical arts. Its tall, white and gold structure beams elegance and sophistication. The city is a bustling economic hub, diverse, and well fortified.

quest_giver.name: Grand Mage Archilus
quest_giver.description: One of the superintendent of the well-renowned Magic Academy, a highly-esteemed academy for magic arts. He has been studying magic for several decades, an excellent master of his craft.

characters.name: Old Mage Supreme Sotek
characters.description: One of the old Mage Supremes, an immensely powerful mage that mastered all of the elemental forces. Sotek stays to himself in the city of Elria, crafting potions from time to time to make money.

goal: Grand Mage Archilus peers into the mage's aura and notices something different yet special about the mage. Grand Mage Archilus hints to the mage to find the Old Mage Supreme.

name: Supreme II
first_tasks: fight the Old Mage Supreme Sotek
